review: Went to the Example law firm and was greeted by friendly staff. Mr. Example was very professional, kind and helpful in explaining my options in my case. I was very pleased with my experience at Example and Associates. Finally, the law practice was conveniently located in the city and not downtown like other lawyers' offices.
